me.description:
Contact for work: (+84) 35 877 1364 - Email: locle.isme@gmail.com - SkypeID: live:.cid.377afd09ce1ddf6e
I'm a developer with 1 year of experience in Javascript and PHP&MySQL technologies (especially with Laravel, VueJS).
I'm always eager to learn new things, willing to embrace emerging technology. I am kind of a team-player because I like to help other and sharing knowledge for them.

projects.title: Graduation essay: Marketplace integrate collaborative filtering
projects.shortDescription:
E-commerce website integrates smart features - product recommendations for users.
Please read file README.md into source code to known detail this project!

details.label: Technology
details.value: VueJS, Laravel, Bootstrap, SCSS, MySQL, Axios, Vuex, Vue router, Font Awesome.

details.label: description
details.value:
Client - Building an e-marketplace website with the following functions:
        + Recommend products to customers (use Collaborative Filtering/User-based)
        + Login, register, edit personal information.
        + Search products, view product details, filter products.
        + Add products to cart, remove products from cart.
        + Add discount code into cart.
        + View store details.
        + Review purchased products, edit reviews.
        + Order products.
        + View orders history, cancel a order.
        + Add products to favorites.
Admin - Build an e-marketplace system administration page with the following functions:
        + Login, register, edit store information.
        + Overview report.
        + Orders management.
        + Products management.
        + Stores management.
        + Categories management.
        + Brands management.
        + Discounts management.

projects.title: Event Booking Platform
projects.shortDescription:
Web application helping them to manage the events and allowing attendees to sign up and see all information they need.
Please read file README.md into source code to known detail this project!

details.label: Technology
details.value: VueJS, Laravel, Bootstrap, MySQL, Axios, Vue Router

details.label: description
details.value:
Client: 
    Building a event booking platform with the following functions:
        + Login, Register, Logout.
        + View events upcoming, browser event agenda, register for once event.
        + Browser detail session, speaker detail.
        + Show list events registered.
Admin:
    Building a event booking platform with the following functions:
        + Login, logout
        + Events management.
        + Tickets management.
        + Channels management.
        + Rooms management.
        + Sessions management.
        + Speakers Management.
        + Room overview report.
